title: Wave Goodbye to Paperworks Let OCR-API do the works
description: Automate your repetitive tasks using our OCR as a Service API, whether it is a converting simple image-to-text job, or extracting values of certain documents, we can do it for you

fitur.title: ID Card Extraction Feature
fitur.description: Extract ID Card Information and converted them to structured data. Simplify eKYC on customer ID

fitur.title: OCR Similarity
fitur.description: Search & validate words from digital documents and images. Reducing time for manual data verification

fitur.title: OCR
fitur.description: Digitize and capture any texts from your documents and images. No more manual labor

title: Profiling Face Faster From a Single Picture
description: Improve your security process width FaceID, a Plug and Play face recognition API able to detect, recognize, and profiling faces from video stream and images

fitur.title: Face Analyzer
fitur.description: Analyze age, sex, emotion from faces. Helps you collecting data for analytical purposes from Image/Video

fitur.title: Face Similarity
fitur.description: Identify any similar faces from captured images. Minimize fraudulence on surveillance system

fitur.title: Mask Detection
fitur.description: Detect whether user is wearing a mask or not. Elevate your surveillances system width mask detection

title: Just Press REC button for Object Detection
description: Monitor your surrounding width RecON. Detecting and counting all objects from your camera/CCTV in real-time. Scalable API width On-Premises and On-Cloud options

fitur.title: On Cloud
fitur.description: Our cloud service will give you seamless and automatic integration. No more hassle on server maintenance

fitur.title: On Premise
fitur.description: Already have your own server? Worry not, RecON is easy to install on any environment. No cloud-footprint, everything is under your control
